# About the data
## source: https://www.kaggle.com/camnugent/california-housing-prices 
According to the California housing prices data, it seems that 44% of 1H Ocean,
32% of the Inland area, and 24% of Other are close to the ocean. In terms of median housing
value, it seems that most people live in housing units that range between 15K and 500K. Also, 
it seems that the average housing median age is 28.6 and the average median income is 3.87K.
